about_the_game:
Have you considered joining the football world as a businessman? 

Some of us may have thought about becoming a manager or a scout. What about owning a club? This is exactly what the experience we offer you focuses on. Continue for details...

Buy a club or clubs on your journey with some budget. Transfer the best players and the best technical team. Improve your club's facilities and give it a vision. Become one of the biggest names in the football world.

If you want, you can be a businessman with the most successful club in the world, the businessman with the most clubs in the world, the richest businessman in the world or a businessman with the best players in the world. What you want to be is limited to your dreams.

The two main concepts that will elevate you and take you to the top among others are management and finance. With the right transfers, the right technical team, the best sponsorships and the best investments, you must increase your income and become a successful club. It is inevitable that you will move towards the top with a properly managed club. Show your skills!

The biggest indicator of your club's success will be the games it wins and the leagues it competes in. There is almost no limit to your rise in this adventure, where you will start with a team from any country you want, wherever you are in the world. Remember that it is very important not only to get to the top but also to stay at the top. As you get stronger, your opponents will do their best to catch up with you and take you down from where you have reached.

Don't expect to always win. You should not give up and be patient with the competitive environment. Avoid making wrong decisions by rushing to achieve success. Always spend your budget on the right transfers and investments. It is important to correct your shortcomings, but it is much more important to make the right moves. 

Once you achieve success, you will find that things get easier, just like they always do. But keep fighting until you reach that point!

name: Boss Of FCs

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 / Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel i3 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel GMA X4500 / NVIDIA GeForce 9600M GT / AMD/ATI Mobility Radeon HD 3650
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 / Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel i5 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel GMA X4500 / NVIDIA GeForce 9600M GT / AMD/ATI Mobility Radeon HD 3650
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Boss Of FCs is a text-based game that includes strategy, simulation and football/soccer. You will start on this path with a certain budget and move towards success and wealth by making the right moves. Make the best deals and the best transfers, buy and sell clubs and move towards the top...
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Turkish
